changelog:
What’s New
Wake word highlights: Wake Word 1 glows bright green, Wake Word 2 glows bright blue. (No custom colors or disable option for now.)

Android Intent Launch: Found under Advanced Features → Intents → Enable Display. When enabled, diagnostic log entities and services will appear.
Use in Home Assistant:
action: esphome.<device_name>_launch_intent
intent_uri:

Supported formats:
- Open app: spotify:
- Package: com.spotify.music
- System settings (must end with ; end):
 Settings: intent:#Intent; action=android.settings.SETTINGS; end
 Developer: intent:#Intent; action=android.settings.APPLICATION_DEVELOPMENT_SETTINGS; end
 Wi-Fi: intent:#Intent; action=android.settings.WIFI_SETTINGS; end
 Bluetooth: intent:#Intent; action=android.settings.BLUETOOTH_SETTINGS; end

Fixes
- Bluetooth works after service restart
- Screen recording switch retains state
- Main icons display correctly
- Unified instruction format for clarity

Coming Soon
Timers and alarm clock are still in design
